author.bio:
She is a marketing expert, who likes indie music, art, traveling and exploring hidden spaces. 
She likes to brag about the nice food she has tried, but occasionally, 
she also thinks too much about existential crises before going to sleep.
author.name: Nadezhda Yankulska

group.title: A Brunch in KALA, Berlin
group.author: Nadezhda Yankulska
group.excerpt: A standard Berlin-type-of-alternative place, with minimalistic design, a sense of authenticity and close attention to sustainability and eco-friendliness.
